Author: Valryan
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Hey guys! We were silent for a long time, but now we have a huge project update.  First and main HostCoin is registered in USA, fully legal and regulated by SEC as token/security and now we are looking for accredited investors from United States. You can check all legal terms and conditions at our main site and our whitepaper (WP download on main page)  https://hostcoin.io  Second but main too Initial Coin Offerint launched 05/26/2018. You can participate by registering at our new wallet https://hostcoinwallet.com  Now we accepting ethereum with our own payment gateway (no more third-parties like tokenlot)  For developers Hostcoin Node downloads links are already there Available for linux and windows OS https://hostcoin.io/downloads/  Our telegram community https://t.me/hostcoin  Maxim M, CIO/Co-Founder, Blockchain Hosting Technologies LLC  Feel free to contact me for any details Twitter, telegram @maxm_ua Linkedin https://linkedin.com/in/maxim-martynenko/

Author: Valryan
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Hey guys.. Sadly HostCoin has crowdfunding as priority rather than technology implementation.. As a result its not exists anymore. Domain expired, servers are down, cuz I was not able to pay for it. I worked with it for a year and finally developed real concept, but it is still need to be finished, verified, and approved by potential partners. If everything will be ok, new project will start soon. All who invested in hostcoin will be included in new blockchain and keep all their balances. If you want to know more you can find me in telegram @maxm_ua Thank you guys, your support and feedback are priceless

Author: Valryan
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Hostcoin.host is used to be a test environment for server management, training in resolving regular possible issues and gaining expirience for tech team members . It's not related to hostcoin as blockchain hosting, and here we offer free cpanel for users just as a bonus.. Why do you think its our ready to use "product"?...

Author: Lionel
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Very interesting !  So basically it is the same as Namecoin (decentralized DNS on the blockchain), but it also has hosted websites directly on the blockchain , while Namecoin is just DNS pointing to normal "traditional" server IPs.  But how about privacy? If you host a website on Hostcoin, you are hosting it on your local computer, right? You may not want to reveal your real IP in case of prosecution by the gov ( as you know, they hinder free speech ).  The best so far used to be TOR/I2P Hidden Services, that let you host a website locally without revealing where it is actually hosted.  Can Hostcoin be an alternative to .onion/garlic sites?

Author: Lionel
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Are you alive?  Your project has potential because of the growing internet censorship by the govs, so there will be a need for a decentralized solution to fight that.  But you have to market it properly and the first step is at least being active on the official forum.  You are not active since the 29 January come on!

Author: Valryan
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: Yes, we are! https://hostcoin.io https://t.me/hostcoin

Author: Lionel
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: I am only skeptical about usability. How are the people supposed to browse Hostcoin sites?  The main problem with Namecoin was not being officially integrated with either existing browsers or the Namecoin wallet itself. People is supposed to install 3rd party browser plugins  to be able to resolve Namecoin websites, and 3rd party plugins are less trustworthy than an official one.  Or they should manually do complicated setups.  I hope you will provide official browser plugins, or dedicated browsers like TOR , maybe integrated into your wallet.  Trust and ease of use is very important to let the Hostcoin web become popular, like TOR hidden services or even more hopefully.

Author: salvibd
Title: [ANN]HostCoin:THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN
Body: HostCoin Pre-ICO IS ON NOW  http://hostcoin.io/  HostCoin - THE WORLD’S FIRST WEBSITE HOSTING SERVICE BUILT ON THE BLOCKCHAIN POWERED BY THE HOSTCOIN  Our plan is to build the premier hosting and domain service on the blockchain, also providing normal options like SSL and email. We at HostCoin feel that it is time for this technology to be brought to the hosting industry as is happening in the financial and other tech service industries.  We intend to raise the sum of $55 million for the world’s first website hosting service built on the blockchain powered by the HostCoin       Social Media  Twitter  https://twitter.com/HOSTCblockchain FaceBook Page  https://www.facebook.com/blockchainhosting/?modal=media_composer FaceBook Group  https://www.facebook.com/search/top/?q=hostcoin%20ico%20soon%20to%20launch YouTube  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqIsXss3V6WT98bpo2XIE8Q/videos Reditt: https://www.reddit.com/r/Cyptocurrency/comments/6xcjx8/hostcoin_worlds_first_website_hosting_will_launch/ GitHub Will be published soon Whitepaper https://hostcoin.io/?page_id=141 Website https://HostCoin.io  Ticker: (hostc)   TEAM  John Furrh – Team Leader https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-furrh-11a38312a/ Maxim Martynenko – Web Master https://www.linkedin.com/in/maxim-martynenko-16297565 Daniel Sanghi – Team Leader https://www.linkedin.com/in/jagath-blockchain-7684b4149/ Taha Dhailey – Lead Developer https://www.linkedin.com/in/taha-dhailey-0a813b83/ Ram Sanhi – CFO https://www.linkedin.com/in/ram-sahni-74996a56/Rajesh Signh – Marketing https://www.linkedin.com/in/rajesh-singh-6a32434/ Tahnu Pillar – Full Stack Developer and Hosting Expert https://www.linkedin.com/in/unahtkarthi/    PREMINE The opportunity to mine HostCoin will be available for those who choose to do so. We have not yet announced premine date.   Bounty Program: A separate tread will be created for the Bounty   Road Map  Within 12 months of the completed sale of the ICO, we will have our hosting service built on blockchain ready for use and reselling by our partners. Reseller qualified ICO holders will be able to start making sales at that time. We will also offer a white label system for reseller accounts to self brand. Our partners will be able to set pricing and terms as they seem fit according to market standards.    OUR BOUNTY PROGRAM
